name: Pizza
description: Classic Italian dish with a tomato base, cheese, and various toppings.
preparation: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and toppings, bake until golden.

name: Salad
description: Fresh, mixed greens with veggies, perfect as a light meal.
preparation: Combine fresh greens, chopped veggies, and dressing. Toss well.

name: Gnocchi
description: Soft Italian potato dumplings, usually served with a savory sauce.
preparation: Boil gnocchi until it floats, then toss in sauce and serve warm.

name: Pot Roast
description: Slow-cooked beef roast with vegetables and rich flavors.
preparation: Sear roast, add veggies and broth, then slow-cook until tender.

name: Lasagna
description: Layered pasta with meat, cheese, and marinara sauce, baked to perfection.
preparation: Layer pasta, sauce, cheese, and meat; bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Hamburger
description: Grilled beef patty in a bun, served with various toppings.
preparation: Grill beef patty, place on bun with toppings of choice, and enjoy.

name: Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles with vegetables, peanuts, and protein of choice.
preparation: Stir-fry noodles with protein, sauce, veggies, and top with peanuts.

name: Sarma
description: Stuffed cabbage rolls filled with rice and meat.
preparation: Fill cabbage leaves with rice and meat, roll and cook in broth.

name: Hot Dog
description: Grilled sausage in a bun, often topped with condiments.
preparation: Grill sausage, place in bun, and top with condiments of choice.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich, moist chocolate cake with layers of frosting.
preparation: Bake cake layers, frost with chocolate frosting, and serve.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, Parmesan, and black pepper.
preparation: Cook pasta, mix with pancetta, egg, and cheese until creamy.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Marinated chicken in spiced tomato-based cream sauce.
preparation: Cook marinated chicken, then simmer in tomato-based sauce.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Beef in creamy mushroom sauce, often served with noodles.
preparation: Saut√© beef and mushrooms, add cream sauce, and serve over noodles.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Quick stir-fried veggies with sauce, often served with rice.
preparation: Stir-fry vegetables in hot oil, add sauce, and serve over rice.

name: Ratatouille
description: French vegetable stew with tomatoes, zucchini, and eggplant.
preparation: Layer sliced vegetables, bake with herbs and olive oil.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta with grilled chicken and Parmesan cheese.
preparation: Cook pasta, mix with Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Soft tacos filled with seasoned fish, cabbage, and sauce.
preparation: Season and cook fish, assemble in tortillas with toppings.
